languages.text: "Лорд-капитан сама к нам спустилась... благость-то какая..."
"The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан сама к нам спустилась... благость-то какая..."

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."
"The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."
"The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."
"The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."

languages.text: “舰长大人亲自来找我们了……多么美妙的祝福啊……”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人亲自来找我们了……多么美妙的祝福啊……”

languages.text: «La mismísima Lord Capitán nos ha bendecido con su presencia... Qué honor...».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."

traits.locale_text: «La mismísima Lord Capitán nos ha bendecido con su presencia... Qué honor...».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンが来てくださるとは…なんという祝福か…」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンが来てくださるとは…なんという祝福か…」

languages.text: "Der Lord Captain ist persönlich zu uns gekommen ... Was für ein Segen ..."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."

traits.locale_text: "Der Lord Captain ist persönlich zu uns gekommen ... Was für ein Segen ..."

languages.text: « La seigneure-capitaine en personne est venue à nous... C'est un grand honneur... »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."

traits.locale_text: « La seigneure-capitaine en personne est venue à nous... C'est un grand honneur... »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan şahsen bize geldi... Ne büyük bir lütuf..."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain herself has come down to us... What a blessing..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan şahsen bize geldi... Ne büyük bir lütuf..."
